byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer in bytes.

byteLength.description: The length of the bufferView in bytes.

target.description: The target that the WebGL buffer should be bound to.
target.gltf_detailedDescription: The target that the WebGL buffer should be bound to.  Valid values are 34962 (ARRAY_BUFFER) or 34963 (ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER).  When this is not provided, the bufferView contains animation or skin data.
